name: South Sweden Flight Academy
about: South Sweden Flight Academy, located at Malmö Airport Sturup, is one of Sweden's largest and most reputable flight schools, approved by the Swedish CAA authority, Transportstyrelsen. Since 2015, with new management since 2017, the academy offers a wide range of courses, including the "Airline Pilot Zero to MCC" integrated program, as well as modular training for various licenses and ratings such as PPL, CPL, IR, ME, and MCC. Our experienced instructors, many with backgrounds in the airforce and commercial airlines, provide comprehensive and tailored training to students from around the world. We pride ourselves on a student-friendly and professional environment, emphasizing quality, team spirit, and safety. With a well-maintained fleet and a supportive learning environment, South Sweden Flight Academy is your gateway to a successful aviation career.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Airline Transport Pilot
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)

Flight Instructor - Multi-Engine (MEI)
Multi-Crew Cooperation Course (MCC)
Jet Orientation Course (JOT)
Instrument Rating (IR)
Multi-Engine Rating
Night Rating
EASA ATPL Ground School
EASA ATPL Ab Initio"]
